name: Cornerstone: The Song of Tyrim
blurb: Wind waker meets Dark Souls\nAn open world, action-adventure game with an emphasis on physics and player-choice, for PC, Mac and Linux.

rewards.reward: No Reward
You'll receive Name in credits.
THE SNEAK PEAK! - - -  Digital download of the awesome closed beta - PC, Mac and Linux.
SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY! - - -\r\nYou'll receive a DRM free, Windows, Mac or linux digital copy of the game when it is released, including Steam code if available! +  closed beta.
IM IN! - - - You'll receive a DRM free, Windows, Mac or linux digital copy of the game when it is released, including Steam code if available +  closed beta \r\n + mentioned in credits.
THE GIVER! - - - You'll receive 2 digital copies of the game, + 2 copies of closed beta  +  mentioned in credits.
I LIKE THE SOUND OF THAT! - - - You'll receive the the soundtrack  + digital copy of the game +  closed beta +  mentioned in credits.

SHUT UP AND LISTEN TO ME! - - -\r\nAccess to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + mentioned in credits + digital copy of the game + closed beta.

The ARCHIVE! --- Digital Art book with developer notes and other secrets!!  also Access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + mentioned in credits + digital copy of the game + closed beta.

THE DIVISION! - - -\r\n(all digital) 4 full game copies + 4 closed-betas + 4 acess to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + mentioned in credits

The CONNOISSEUR -  Digital Art book with developer notes and other secrets!! Also access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + mentioned in credits + digital copy of the game + closed beta + digital soundtrack.

MY NAME!!!!! --- *KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE* Your NAME in the game! Carved into the ancient wall of The First Ones. Also Access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + mentioned in credits + digital copy of the game + closed beta.

THE GAMER! - - - You'll receive a physical copy of the game  Access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits, digital copy oft he closed-beta.

THE EXPLORER! - - - You'll receive physical World map+ the physical copy of the game + also Access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback, also mentioned in credits, digital copy oft he closed-beta.

THE SMITH! - - - Design a game item/builing or prop (no penises!... unless they're hidden!) (all digital) + the full game + closed-beta + acess to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + your name mentioned in credits

I KNOW THAT GUY! - - - Design your own game character with dialogue and backstory that will be added to the game \r\n(all digital) + the full game + closed-beta + acess to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + your name mentioned in credits

THE MONSTER! --- Design an Enemy!! (all digital) + the full game + closed-beta + access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + your name mentioned in credits.
THE COLLECTOR! - - - (All Limited addition) Art book, T-shirts, World map poster, Game posters, Physical copy of the game, (digital) closed-beta.

THIS IS MY LAND! ---  Design an secondary island as much as you want within guidelines that will be added to the game (all digital) + the full game + closed-beta + access to a private forum were you can directly influence the creation of the game, and give feedback + your name mentioned in credits.

THE ULTIMATE PACKAGE! --- THE PLEDGE TO END ALL PLEDGES! With this pledge you will get everything above in this one package. Check the chart at the bottom of the page for more details. (Excluding The Producer pledge).

THE PRODUCER! - - - This is the most awesome part. Those who get this spot get to work on the game with us on all levels, like ; game design, scripting, music, lore, marketing, 3D art, concept art, level design, and all the rest of the amazing parts of creating a game. Long story short, you will basically be a team member throughout the development.
